{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2505.05455v1", "title": "Calculation of ground state energy of Lithium and Beryllium based on
  variational method", "summary": "With the consideration of identity principle and atomic shell structure, we
calculated the ground state energy of Lithium atom and Beryllium atom based on
variational method, which accords quite well with the experimental results.", "main_category": "physics.atom-ph", "categories": "physics.atom-ph", "published": "2025-05-08T17:45:31Z"}
